item.title: Anvilor
item.description:
- Business, design strategy
- Branding/identity
- Website

About

  • Company founded by [[Tim Kutcher]]
  • Data-based framework for developing custom data-collection solutions
  • Conceived as part of R&D efforts at DICORP, Anvilor launched as it’s own company in early 2024

Company launch

  • [[anvilor-launch]]
    • Anvilor logo (iterations)?

Support internal team operations, tool UX

  • Anvilor platform primarily a means to empower internal development of custom data-collection solutions for clients (e.g., forms, online auctions) with advantages in logic and data formatting.

item.title: DICORP, Inc.
item.description:
I joined DICORP, Inc. in 2022, serving as the first & only designer in the healthcare software company’s nearly 40-year history. My primary responsibilities are user-experience, graphic, and web design, with additional roles in research, development, IT, branding, and communications.

I’ve pioneered user-centric design, contributing a perspective that challenges the status quo

As one man team, I’ve developed my skills as a communicator—championing and educating design to clients, engineers, and leadership—and as an architect—creating the systems and infrastructure that enable everyone to design.
